name: mockaroo-categories-generator

scripts.generate-sql: node -e "const {generateSQLFromCSV, writeSQLFile} = require('./src/utils/sql-generator'); const path = require('path'); const csvPath = path.join(__dirname, 'output', 'categories.csv'); const sqlScript = generateSQLFromCSV(csvPath, 'categories'); writeSQLFile(csvPath.replace('.csv', '.sql'), sqlScript); console.log('âœ… SQL script generated!');"

author: Software Testing Team
description: Mockaroo-based data generator for categories table with realistic tool categories
